Package gobblin.util.limiter.stressTest

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Stressor
    An experiment for throttling service stress test.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FixedOperationsStressor
    A Stressor that performs a fixed number of permit requests to the Limiter without pausing.
    MRStressTest
    An MR job to test the performance of throttling.
    MRStressTest.AggregatorReducer
    Simply adds up the rates for each key.
    MRStressTest.MyInputFormat
    Input format that just generates MRStressTest.NUM_MAPPERS dummy splits.
    MRStressTest.MyRecordReader
    A dummy RecordReader that emits a single key-value.
    MRStressTest.MySplit
    A dummy InputSplit.
    MRStressTest.StresserMapper
    Instantiates a Stressor and runs it until it exits.
    RandomDelayStartStressor
    A Stressor that sleeps for a random delay between 0 and 30 seconds before starting.
    RandomRuntimeStressor
    A Stressor that repeatedly requests 1 permits from Limiter for a random number of seconds between 1 and 181.
    RateComputingLimiterContainer
    Used to compute statistics on a set of Limiters used in a throttling service stress test.
    StressTestUtils
    Utilities for throttling service stress tests.
